pkgmetadata.longdescription: =================Products=================A Django app to create products.Quick start-----------1. Add "artd_product" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this: INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'artd_product', ]2. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create the product models.3. Run ``python manage.py create_taxes`` to create tax types.4. Start the development server and visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/
